Text: CORRECTION TO RONS CELL PHONEOur apologies Rons correct CELL PHONE number should you need it is Michelle Britton filling in for Michele van der Noort Forwarded by Michele van der NoortHOUNorthAmericaMCKINSEY on PM Ron Hulme Sent by To Michele van cc der Noort Subject PUSHING AHEAD PM Greg We are pushing ahead and have scheduled two hours with you on Thursday afternoon to review progress I wanted to reconfirm the scopefocus of our effort with the attached chart As we discussed our primary focus is around pushing the MA case for action and options This effort is well underway As we also discussed we will push forward on the stock price valuation from the standpoint of understanding the likely impact of potential disclosureswriteoffs and assessing the value which Enron should attribute to the stock if you were to use it as an MA currency This step requires some recharacterization of baseline earnings and you expressed the concern that it would be difficult to address this topic prior to the completion of the budget process We think we can approximate the impact more quickly through an alternative process which we will describe on Thursday Finally we think we should spend some time addressing fallback options besides MA see chart Please give me a call on my cell phone or leave a voicemail at to confirm that we are or are not on the right track I look forward to seeing you Thursday Regards See attached file PAGER ho ppt This message may contain confidential andor privileged information If you are not the addressee or authorized to receive this for the addressee you must not use copy disclose or take any action based on this message or any information herein If you have received this message in error please advise the sender immediately by reply email and delete this message Thank you for your cooperation
